NetBSD/hpcmips IPv6 & IPsec support

This page contains information about NetBSD/hpcmips IPv6 & IPsec support. and pocket IPv6 environment information.

IPv6 & IPsec support

IPv6 & IPsec support (top)

NetBSD/hpcmips support IPv6 & IPsec same as other NetBSD ports. rtsol,ping6,traceroute6.. and other application works fine on GENERIC kernel configration.NetBSD/hpcmips is good solution for small-battery drive-lowcost IPv6 mobile computing environment.

IWPC - IPv6 World Pocketcomputing Chanpionship
